scripts.localLambda: npm run babel && lambda-local --profile-path ~/.aws/credentials --profile prod.train-planner -l index.js -h handler -e example-requests/successful-assistant-request.js -v 3 && npm run removeCompiledSource
scripts.awsShip: npm run zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name trainDayPlanner --zip-file fileb://./trainDayPlanner.zip --profile prod.train-planner --region eu-west-2
